prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that has a massive flower on its back and is primarily green.
I want a Pokemon resembling a dinosaur with large leaves and vibrant pink flowers.
Generate a creature that embodies nature, featuring a large, bulbous plant on its back.
Make a Pokemon with a sturdy, bulky body covered in foliage and a colorful flower.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines plant and reptile features, standing strong in the forest.
Design a Pokemon with a serene expression, surrounded by lush greenery and vivid petals.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, specializing in powerful nature-based attacks.
